response.overview: Animation series aimed at preschool audiences, shows two characters (Pelúcio and Pelúcia), “live” pieces of plush that live in a world made of cloth. Their game is to transform into anything covered with plush: animals, plants, objects and even concepts as joy, fear or will. In these transformations, they experience characteristics and problems of being each of these things:  How do bats pee in bed? Do volcanoes have a stomach burn? Is joy a thing or a color?  Feeling “on the skin” what it is being “the other”, the characters deal with the notion of otherness and work on issues pertinent to the target audience universe.
response.title: Os Pelúcias
